definitions.title: n.pr.
definitions.body: . (Dl:Pr 210 trans. O ! would that! (cf. [[אַחְלַי]] sub III. [[אָח]] supr. p. 25) & comp. interjectional Bab. name Aḫulapia, O! that I at last! Zim:BP 116; cf. Ol:§ 277; otherwise Hal:JAS 7, x. 360)

definitions.title: 1. f.
definitions.body: daughter of Sheshan 1Ch 2:31; so Be Öt al. in view of v:1Ch 2:34.

definitions.title: 2. m.
definitions.body: father of one of David's mighty men (not in 2Sa 23) 1Ch 11:41.
